timeline.bodyText: maybe rename to ProcessMetrics to make clear these are not just standard Java-provided metrics?
timeline.author: trask

timeline.bodyText: can this be part of the other (future) module that only depends on JVM-provided metrics?
timeline.author: trask

replies.bodyText:
It depends on oshi.
If I will move it to separate module it will have the same dependency on oshi as system metrics.
Activation will be the same: presence of oshi dependency.
Therefore I doubt to split it to two modules.
replies.author: malafeev

replies.bodyText: runtime.java.gc_count metric has dependency on oshi?
replies.author: trask

replies.bodyText: oh, you mean only this specific metric, I thought you are talking about all jvm metrics here.
replies.author: malafeev

replies.bodyText: I can create separate instrumentation/jvm/libarary with only this metric.
replies.author: malafeev

replies.bodyText: 👍 how about removing runtime.java.gc_count from this PR and then we'll merge this (sorry again it took so long!), and u can send separate PR with instrumentation/jvm/library?
replies.author: trask
